name: TimeScatter
description:
How to play:

R - To rewind to your last position 2 seconds ago and damaging all enemies that are hit while you are in rewind

AWD - To move left and right and jump to traverse through the levels

Kill all enemies on the screen to get to the next level. You have 6 lifes each level and can only fight using your rewind mechanic, which has a cooldown of 2 seconds.

This game was made for the NES Jam in 7 days.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/silvallis

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiocCQSDynOKXLqRIrSv6Ng
